name: Toy Tanks Demo
description:
How To Play:

- Must have a Gamepad Connected, I use an Xbox Controller

- Navigate the Menus with the Left/Right Dpad Buttons or the Left Joystick. Also use the "Start" and "A" buttons.

- Hold the Y Button in certain menus to see addition helpful information.

Gameplay:

- Left Joystick controls how the tank moves.

- Right Joystick controls your tanks gun (Where it's aiming)

- Right Trigger Fires your Primary shot

- "A" Button allows the tank to jump, hold this down to jump higher

- Landing after a jump gives the player a speed boost, *Unless the player lets go of the left joystick while in the air

- Each tank has a health bar, can be seen above tank

- Each tank has a reload bar that displays the number of shots in your clip along with how long till the next shot is reloaded

- Shooting before a shot is reloaded results in lost reload progress

- Shooting right after your clip becomes full results in a faster shot.

- All shots give the shooting tank and the shot tank a force depending on that projectiles stats and the velocity of your tank.

- Acceleration and Max Speed are independent values, (A tank could have poor acceleration but have a very high max speed. Players that are able to maintain their momentum will be better able to take advantage of this stat.)

- Black bullets go through white bullets 

- Bullets of the same color destroy each other when they collide. 

- PS. THE GAME DOES NOT HAVE ANY SOUND.  if you know a good sound designer, let me know.
